comments:
Eclipse 200311201600
OS X 10.3.1

When running the runtime workbench, I get the following error in the console:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.isAlreadyRunning(Main.java:1504)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:597)

there are no logs present.

Channing

Which VM are you running on? Eclipse 3.0 requires a 1.4 VM to run.

The failure happens because the launcher uses 1.4 specific API, and it seems to
not be available in your setup. 

We need to be able to run at least the launcher on a 1.2/1.3 VM and produce a
clear message describing the problem. This is being handled in bug 44814.

Ah, eclipse is running under 1.4 but I lauched the workbench under 1.3.
Switching made it work correctly.

Sorry about that.

Perhaps the Run time workbench launcher should warn that the VM being used is
not compatible?

Agreed. The PR mentioned above takes care of that. Closing...

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44814 ***
